name: Soccer Shoot Stars 2017 World Legend
description:
Welcome to Soccer Shooting Stars 2017 Word Legend, “The best football game on mobiles.”. The soccer game acclaimed and adored by players and the gaming press en masse.
It’s the last minute of the game and your opponent has the ball… but he’s lost it! What a chance to score the winner… you take aim, shoot, slide, flick ball....Soccer stars is easy to pick up and fun to play
Have fun with this amazing soccer shootout game and manage your own professional football career.

With simple gameplay and great physics, Soccer Shooting or stars is easy to pick up and fun to play! In true competitive style, challenge your opponents all over the world for online table soccer matches! Oh, and you can also play offline against a friend in the same device!

Be the best playing the best teams in the world and win the tournament. Soccer Shootout not the same Penalty Kicks, you must use your head to think a dynamic to goals and win game or lost game.
You are the star of the show as you launch your soccer, App Store #1 sports RPG from New Star Games.
The graphics have been improved for you to enjoy the best soccer game.
Have you got what it takes to score the match winning goal? Recreate your favourite goals in this unique football based puzzle game. Football fan or not, this app will keep you entertained for hours!

KEY FEATURES
- Free to play! Hundreds of hours of entertainment at your fingertips!
- Online and offline multiplayer game
- Simple and fun gameplay
- Amazing ball physics will develop your talent!
- Play against your friends
- Super addictive, exciting simulation of the modern football universe!
- Create your alter ego and make your way through the leagues to International glory!
- Experience highs and lows, make key decisions and build your celebrity lifestyle!
- Enjoy the casino, own race-horses and more besides - but keep the boss sweet!

DEVELOPER INFO: Soccer Shootout is the leading developer in truly cross-platform social gaming! Chart-topping hits include Panda bubble shoot christmas, Crazy Color Switch, Match Delicious Fruit Christmas, Bottle Flip, and so many more! Check out our other free match 3 puzzle games! You'll love to swap, match, and crunch through ever expanding levels and events. Check back often to see all the new candy, cake, and sweet treats that we've added! You'll love to crush through each sweet puzzle. Begin your adventure on one of our free match three puzzle games today!
